venue.address_1: Intersection of Lake St. & Amy Drive
venue.name: Risley Pond

item.description: Moderately paced walk with commentary about Risley Pond, owned by the Manchester Land Conservation Trust. Hilly and bumpy terrain with nice views. We will walk for about 1-1/4 hours, on one of several loop trails that goes around the pond. Heavy rain cancels because there is a brook to cross, which could be difficult when in flood. No dogs, please. There are no restrooms at the park. Park at the parking lot off Lake Street on the north side of the pond, across from Amy Drive, Vernon. Additional parking along Amy Drive.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: CANCELED DUE TO WEATHER: Risley Park after-work hike
